heading: Nyimpa nyina beyi Ewuradze ayɛw wɔ Mfe Apem da no mu—Ɔbɛtsena hɔn mu—Fa to Isaiah 12 ho. Bɛyɛ mfe 559–545 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.

verses.txt: Na da no mu ebɛse dɛ; O Ewuradze, medze ndaase mebɛma wo; na kaansa wo bo fuuw me a, woebufuw no adan kɔ, na ɔwo ekyekye mo werɛ.
Hwɛ Nyame nye mo nkwagye; mobɔtwer, na munnkosuro; na Ewuradze Jehovah nye m’ahoɔdzen nye mo ndwom; na ɔno na ɔabɛyɛ mo nkwagye.
Dɛm ntsi, enyigye na hom dze bɔtow nsu efi nkwagye bura no mu.
Na da no hom bɛkã dɛ: Hom nyi Ewuradze ayew, hom mbɔ ne dzin, hom mbɔ ne nyɛe dawur nkyerɛ aman, hom mbɔ dzin dɛ wɔama ne dzin do.
Hom ntow ndwom mma Ewuradze; na ɔayɛ adze kyɛnee: hom mma wonhu yi wɔ asaase nyina.
Keka mu na bɔ ose, ɔwo a etse Zion; na Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi a ɔtse wo mu no ɔsõ.
